# OVHcloud AI Endpoints

Use `ovhcloud/<model>` with VoltAgent's model router.

## Quick start

```ts
import { Agent } from "@voltagent/core";

const agent = new Agent({
  name: "ovhcloud-agent",
  instructions: "You are a helpful assistant",
  model: "ovhcloud/deepseek-r1-distill-llama-70b",
});
```

## Environment variables

- `OVHCLOUD_API_KEY`

## Provider package

`@ai-sdk/openai-compatible`

This provider uses the OpenAI-compatible adapter.

## Default base URL

`https://oai.endpoints.kepler.ai.cloud.ovh.net/v1`

You can override the base URL by setting `OVHCLOUD_BASE_URL`.

## Provider docs

- https://www.ovhcloud.com/en/public-cloud/ai-endpoints/catalog//
